#summary Getting Started page.

==Dependencies==

PoHessian depends on the modules Foundation and Net from [http://pocoproject.org Poco].

Using Debian, for example, you can get it using:
{{{
$ sudo apt-get install libpoco-dev
}}}

If you need to build it from source, here is its [http://pocoproject.org/download/index.html download] page. Read the [http://poco.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/poco/poco/branches/poco-1.4.3/README Poco README].

==Get the code==

Download the [http://code.google.com/p/pohessian/downloads/detail?name=pohessian-1.0.tar.gz latest source package].

==Unzip==

{{{
$ tar -xzf pohessian-1.0.tar.gz
$ cd pohessian-1.0
}}}

==Compile==

{{{
$ ./configure
$ make
}}}

This will output (on Darwin):

{{{
$ ls -p1 .libs/libpohessian.*
.libs/libpohessian.0.0.0.dylib
.libs/libpohessian.0.dylib
.libs/libpohessian.a
.libs/libpohessian.dylib
.libs/libpohessian.la
.libs/libpohessian.lai
}}}

==Test (Optional)==

{{{
$ make check
}}}

==Install (Optional)==

{{{
$ sudo make install
}}}

==Uninstall (Optional)==

{{{
$ sudo make uninstall
}}}
